tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Convert content from various sources to structured Markdown format.

    Args:
        source: The source of the content (HTTP/HTTPS URL, file path, or data URI).

    Returns:
        The converted content in Markdown format.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the source type is not supported or conversion fails.

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Valid HTML File to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否将本地HTML文件正确转换为Markdown格式。

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: '﻿

使用utf-8编码插入的HTML段落

'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否将PDF文件内容正确转换为Markdown格式。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\paper1.pdf: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xd0 in position 10: invalid continuation byte

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Remote HTTP Content to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否能从HTTP URL获取内容并成功转换为Markdown。

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Client error '404 Not Found' for url 'http://example.com/sample.html'
For more information check: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/404

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否支持Base64编码的数据URI输入并正确转换。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'Hello world'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具在遇到不支持的文件类型时是否抛出ValueError。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\app.ico: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xbb in position 14: invalid start byte

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具对不存在的文件路径是否进行有效错误处理。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Unsupported source type: D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nonexistent.docx

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否能够处理隐藏文件的转换操作。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'This is a hidden file.'

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Test Long and Special Character Path
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否能处理包含特殊字符和长路径的源地址。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Unsupported source type: D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\测试_文件!@#$%^&*()_+-=中文名.csv
